# Introduction
Disneyland is one of the most popular themed parks in the world. However, visitors often spend a long time waiting in line for each attraction and could not enjoy more attractions in a day. As a result, we want to explore Disney Magic Kingdom Parkâ€™s historical wait time and discover some patterns. Furthermore, we would like to gain some insights on how to spend time wisely and enjoy as many attractions as possible.
